name: Peace in the Storm
description: Peace in the Storm is a game that I made in week with school happening. In the game you upgrade your computer to get more peace (health) and try to get the best computer. Also this game was made for the The BRACKEYS GAME JAM 2021.2 in a week and the theme: Let There be Chaos. At the end of making the game I rushed and made the cars and other things easier and less fun but I had limited time. But of coarse I had fun and learned a lot from this jam. GG! (also the mouse movement is high.. sorry!) Some textures in this game are from here! cgbookcase.com | PBR Textures, free for any purpose
